sqlQuery.name: SnpAlias
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT source_id, project_id, source_id as old_source_id, project_id AS old_project_id FROM ApidbTuning.SnpAttributes

sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sqlParamValue: WHEN 'InsertSnps.pm NGS SNPs INTERNAL' THEN 'HTS SNPs'
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT bfmv.source_id, bfmv.project_id , bfmv.chromosome_order_num, lower(bfmv.project_id) as lc_project_id , coalesce( dsa.display_name , CASE bfmv.dataset &&dataset_display_names&& ELSE bfmv.dataset END ) as dataset , bfmv.seq_source_id, bfmv.location , bfmv.location - 5000 as context_start , bfmv.location + 5000 as context_end , greatest(bfmv.location - 29) as align_context_start , bfmv.location + 30 as align_context_end , CASE WHEN bfmv.reference_strain = 'iowa_II' THEN 'IOWA II' WHEN bfmv.reference_strain = 'md' THEN 'MD' WHEN bfmv.reference_strain = 'tu114' THEN 'TU114' ELSE bfmv.reference_strain END as reference_strain , bfmv.reference_na , CASE bfmv.is_coding WHEN 1 THEN 'coding' ELSE 'non-coding' END is_coding , bfmv.position_in_CDS , bfmv.position_in_protein, bfmv.reference_aa , CASE WHEN is_coding = 0 then null ELSE CASE has_nonsynonymous_allele WHEN 1 THEN 'Has Non-Synonymous' ELSE 'Synonymous' END END has_nonsynonymous_allele , bfmv.gene_source_id, bfmv.gene_strand, bfmv.lflank , CONCAT(bfmv.lflank,'',bfmv.reference_na,'',bfmv.rflank ) as snp_context , bfmv.rflank, bfmv.reference_na as allele, bfmv.organism as organism_text, bfmv.ncbi_tax_id , '' || SUBSTR(bfmv.organism, 1, 1) || '.' || REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTR(bfmv.organism, strpos(bfmv.organism, ' ')), '[[:space:]]+', chr(38) || 'nbsp;') || '' AS formatted_organism , bfmv.minor_allele_frequency, bfmv.major_allele_frequency , bfmv.distinct_strain_count, bfmv.distinct_allele_count, bfmv.minor_product , bfmv.major_product,bfmv.major_allele,bfmv.minor_allele , bfmv.major_allele_count,bfmv.minor_allele_count , trim(to_char(bfmv.location,'99,999,999')) as location_text , CASE WHEN bfmv.gene_strand = 'reverse' and bfmv.rflank is not null THEN apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.rflank) END as lflank_gene_strand , CASE WHEN bfmv.gene_strand = 'reverse' and bfmv.lflank is not null THEN apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.lflank) END as rflank_gene_strand , CASE WHEN bfmv.gene_strand = 'reverse' THEN apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.reference_na) END as allele_gene_strand , CASE WHEN bfmv.gene_strand = 'reverse' THEN apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.rflank)||''||apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.reference_na) ||''||apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.lflank) END as snp_context_gene_strand FROM ApidbTuning.SnpAttributes bfmv LEFT JOIN apidbtuning.DatasetPresenter dsa ON bfmv.dataset = dsa.name

sqlQuery.name: Browser
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.source_id, sa.project_id, attr.public_abbrev as organismAbbrev FROM apidbtuning.snpAttributes sa, apidbtuning.organismAttributes attr WHERE sa.organism = attr.organism_name

sqlQuery.name: Sequence
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT snp.source_id, snp.project_id, SUBSTR(nas.sequence,snp.location - 60,60) as lflank, SUBSTR(nas.sequence,snp.location,1) as allele, SUBSTR(nas.sequence,snp.location + 1,60) as rflank FROM dots.nasequence nas, apidbtuning.SNPAttributes snp WHERE snp.na_sequence_id = nas.na_sequence_id
